### Outputs

All [input](#inputs) properties are implicitly available as output properties. Additionally, the ExpressRouteCircuitConnection resource produces the following output properties:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="circuitconnectionstatus_csharp">

    </dt>
